stories.fantasy_headline: Wizards Uncover Early Signs of Memory Fading Sickness!
stories.fantasy_story: The Grand Wizards of the Arcane Tower have found a secret brain-light pattern that can warn of the dreaded Memory Fading Sickness. This magical insight offers hope for early protection.

stories.fantasy_headline: Alchemists Forge Crystal with Mystical Twisting Magnetic Powers!
stories.fantasy_story: The skilled Alchemists of the Southern Marshlands have crafted a wondrous new crystal! This artifact compels tiny, invisible magnetic spirits to swirl and dance in intricate, repeating patterns. stories.fantasy_headline: Enchanted Floor-Sweeping Golems: The Latest in Household Magic!
